messages.message: @arun do you know why https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/14098 is still getting the yapf reformatting? i thought you changed the settings so that it would not reformat files anymore?
it's possible yutaka had setup pre-commit things before heymian fixed it?
Oh good to know that the yapf formatting isn't expected. I'll take a look at the dev environment setup docs again.

@arun @lydia sorry, i'm not sure what the expected behavior is here. according to this https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/.pre-commit-config.yaml#L2-L9 it seems like the `yapf` formatting pre-commit *is* still supposed to be triggered for the file that I updated in that PR, since it's not in any of the excluded directories. Is the issue that the formatting args that were added a few weeks ago aren't getting applied?
yeah it seems to be that the args added a few weeks ago aren't applied

i had upgraded yapf, which changed some style presets, but things should have probably changed back after heymian fixed it -- at least on my end i didn't have to do anything more than run `pre-commit install` again
